en: The plans for the company outing don't sound too exciting.
zh: 公司团建的计划听着没啥意思。

en: I'm surrounded by fuckwits!
zh: 我周围全是蠢货！

en: Frankly, no one really stands out.
zh: 说实话，没谁表现得特别突出。

en: You call that a marriage?
zh: 你管那叫婚姻？

en: * The basic prohibitions (No slander, libel, etc.) are noted in the "Read me first." Please be sure to read it.
zh: 基本的禁令（比如不许诽谤、中伤等）都在“必读”里，请务必读一下。

en: This is off-topic. Sorry.
zh: 扯远了，不好意思。

en: They contacted the station staff but the man had left the area and gone out through the ticket barrier.
zh: 他们联系了车站工作人员，但那人已经出闸机走掉了。

en: Me, I'll make it to the class reunion no matter what I have to leave undone.
zh: 我嘛，不管手头有什么事儿没做完，都一定要去参加同学聚会。

en: But, if by that, morale drops wouldn't that defeat the purpose of the exercise?
zh: 但如果因此让士气受挫，不就违背了演习的初衷吗？

en: I cannot help but be concerned about the commercialism of Hollywood movies.
zh: 我忍不住担心好莱坞电影的商业化倾向。

en: All hands, abandon ship!
zh: 所有人注意，弃船！

en: He has come to look like a sly-as-a-fox Premier who uses his position's powers to the fullest extent, to his own advantage.
zh: 他现在看起来就像个老奸巨猾的总理，把职权用到了极致来为自己谋利。

en: You should get there in five minutes walking.
zh: 走路过去大概五分钟就到了。

en: So characteristic of what a pious Christian would say, this courteous phrase.
zh: 这么客气的措辞，真是典型的虔诚基督徒会说的话。

en: This sentence is in the present perfect. 'have' is not a verb, but an auxiliary verb.
zh: 这个句子是现在完成时。“have”不是动词，而是助动词。

en: Yes, truthfully, until it was right in front of me like this, I half-doubted it ...
zh: 是的，说实话，直到它真真切切地出现在我面前，我都还一直半信半疑的……

en: These are both called "future volitional" and include the intent of the subject.
zh: 这两者都叫“将来意愿型”，包含了主体的意图。

en: Adverbial time clauses (here 'when') write about the future in the present tense.
zh: 时间状语从句（这里指 when 引导的）用现在时来表示将来。

en: The present perfect expresses the long span from past to present.
zh: 现在完成时表达的是从过去到现在的很长一段跨度。

en: "Past tense" is used in connection with actions in the past.
zh: “过去式”用于描述发生在过去的动作。

en: It's a troll trying for click-throughs. It's being multiposted in English-related communities all over the place.
zh: 这是个骗点击的喷子。现在到处都在英语社区里疯狂刷屏。

en: This e-zine is for those who, unswayed by the cajolery of the modern language industry, firmly trust that the traditional learning method of grammatical analysis is the way to go.
zh: 这份电子刊物是专门面向那些不为现代语言产业的忽悠所动，坚信传统语法分析法才是正道的人。

en: We use "present tense" for this kind of case.
zh: 这种情况我们会用“现在时”。

en: Oh boy ... when they hang out with you for long everyone ends up picking up your bad habits.
zh: 哎呀……跟你待久了，大家都染上你的坏毛病了。

en: 'The child is father to the man' is certainly well said.
zh: “三岁看大”这话确实说得很精辟。

en: Christmas in Japan is, if anything, a day for couples.
zh: 在日本，圣诞节真要说起来其实是情侣们的节日。

en: These drinks are a la carte.
zh: 这些饮料都是单点的。

en: There's someone I'm in (unrequited) love with, but that person is busy now and I don't get replies to my emails.
zh: 我有个暗恋的对象，但那个人最近太忙了，都不回我邮件。

en: You've both been very impressive today. I'm proud of you.
zh: 你们俩今天表现都很出色，我为你们感到骄傲。

en: Oh, that's a secret, OK? Because slipping out of the dorm in the night is severely punished.
zh: 噢，这可是个秘密，别说出去啊。毕竟半夜溜出宿舍是要受重罚的。

en: I'm not good at posting stuff online.
zh: 我不太擅长在网上发帖。

en: I say "should", because theses written in the present tense are still seen around and about.
zh: 我之所以说“应该”，是因为随处还是能见到用现在时写的论文。

en: It's well said that "You can't judge people by their appearance", isn't it?
zh: “人不可貌相”这话一点儿不假，对吧？

en: It's when you become able to move that the real value of health hits home.
zh: 只有当你重新恢复行动能力时，你才会真正体会到健康的价值。

en: He kindly answered questions.
zh: 他很亲切地回答了大家的问题。

en: However fine the words of the management, those working for them see what is to be seen.
zh: 无论管理层说得多么天花乱坠，干活的人心里都清清楚楚。

en: There was nothing wrong with their ability, it was just that the expense for each unit was so vast that the cost performance was bad.
zh: 他们的能力没问题，只是单件成本太高，性价比太差。

en: Ha-ha ... She isn't human. She's a robot; A-n-d-r-o-i-d.
zh: 哈哈……她不是人类，她是机器人，人造人。

en: Your division was highly praised for fighting well in the midst of a hopeless conflict.
zh: 你们师在胜算渺茫的情况下打得非常出色，受到了高度赞扬。

en: We want you to take command of this unified force.
zh: 我们想让你来指挥这支联军。

en: Throwing knives were stuck deep into the men's necks.
zh: 几把飞刀深深地扎进了那些人的脖子里。

en: I'd like to do without commas, but 6 feels odd if it doesn't have commas.
zh: 我本想省掉逗号，但第6条如果不加逗号看着很别扭。

en: Elementary and primary school children don't yet know good from evil or reality from fiction.
zh: 小学生还分不清善恶是非，也分不清现实和虚幻。

en: However you could say that being found hard to understand by the common folk for one's genius is fate.
zh: 不过你也可以说，天才不被凡夫俗子理解就是命。

en: It's raining again. I wonder if we will be able to have the February snow festival?
zh: 又下雨了，不知道二月份的冰雪节还能不能照常举行。

en: Despair drove him to attempt suicide.
zh: 绝望驱使他走上了自杀的路。

en: Mr Pryor collapsed with a subarachnoid haemorrhage when rehearsing for a performance in Paris. He was taken to local hospital but passed away at 4:23 pm.
zh: 普赖尔先生在巴黎排练演出时突发蛛网膜下腔出血倒地。虽然被送往当地医院，但还是在下午4点23分去世了。

en: You couldn't say that was a plan with any sense of reality to it.
zh: 那个计划怎么看都一点儿不切实际。

en: "Practising sword throwing?" "It just slipped out of my hands."
zh: “在练习投剑吗？”“刚才只是手滑了。”

en: In many languages the way dictionary-form words end is fixed; in Japanese they end in a 'u row' character.
zh: 许多语言的词典原形词尾是固定的；日语里则是以“u段”假名结尾。

en: Oh, but don't worry. I don't put the moves on straight guys.
zh: 噢，别担心。我对直男没兴趣，不会去撩他们的。

en: I pay my university fees to go to university by part-time work. Well, I'm a 'working student' I suppose.
zh: 我是靠打工赚学费上大学的。嗯，我大概算是个“勤工俭学”的学生吧。

en: "I've heard about it, Koichi" "You don't need to say anything more, I know. It's the summer festival incident at the shrine, right?"
zh: “我已经听说了，浩一。”“不用再说了，我知道。是神社夏日祭那件事对吧？”

en: "You're OK without your glasses?" "Ah, these are fake you see, I thought it might make me brainier..."
zh: “你不戴眼镜没关系吗？”“啊，这是平光镜，我以为戴上能显得聪明点儿……”

en: That's a plan that sounds likely to be cancelled by rain.
zh: 这计划听起来很容易因为下雨而泡汤。

en: That's a plan that would likely to be canceled by rain.
zh: 这个计划遇上下雨估计就得取消了。

en: Just as if that was proof that that English was correct.
zh: 就好像那能证明那句英语是正确的一样。

en: There is a world of difference between, "somehow being understood" and "using correct English."
zh: “勉强能让人听懂”和“使用正确的英语”之间可是有着天壤之别的。

en: If the more advanced want to improve English ability (especially reading comprehension) increasing vocabulary is the way to go.
zh: 如果高阶学习者想要提高英语能力（尤其是阅读理解），增加词汇量才是王道。

en: And also the gym uniform is still gym shorts, isn't it? I wonder why.
zh: 还有，体育课校服居然还是那种运动短裤呢。真奇怪。

en: Ah, the phone card's already running out.. See you in half an hour.
zh: 啊，电话卡快没钱了……半小时后见。

en: The bidet-toilet itself has not spread much outside of Japan.
zh: 这种智能马桶盖在国外其实还没怎么普及。

en: This week I've watched foreign car-action movies with subtitles for three days in a row.
zh: 这周我连着三天都在看带字幕的国外赛车动作片。

en: There's no telling when she'll stab you in the back.
zh: 谁也说不准她什么时候会在背后捅你一刀。

en: In the end, it was just too much bother so I went home by taxi.
zh: 到头来，我实在嫌太麻烦，就打车回家了。

en: Ha-ha-ha, pray forgive me. Please don't worry yourself about that!
zh: 哈哈哈，请多包涵。别把那事儿放在心上！

en: I'm going to get going before this feeling goes!! Well they do say "Strike while the iron is hot."
zh: 趁着这股劲头还在，我这就出发！毕竟俗话说得好，“趁热打铁”嘛。

en: They still haven't been able to work out quite what her motive was for resorting to crime.
zh: 他们还没搞清楚她犯罪的具体动机到底是什么。

en: By means of a super high-pressure water spray practically all the sediment is removed.
zh: 通过超高压喷水，几乎所有的沉淀物都能被清除掉。

en: We don't have polygamy in Japan, dear.
zh: 亲爱的，日本可不兴一夫多妻制。

en: Of course. Now that you say that, certainly Ms Tanaka wasn't shot even once in the mock battles.
zh: 的确。听你这么一说，田中小姐在模拟战里确实一次都没被击中过。

en: To my side, my wife, who I'm presently at odds with, lies sleeping.
zh: 我身边，正跟我闹矛盾的老婆正睡着呢。

en: It's all over.
zh: 全都结束了。

en: Many people suffer from heart disease in Japan, but in Libya those having heart attacks have also increased a lot recently.
zh: 日本有很多心脏病患者，不过利比亚最近心脏病发作的人也增加了很多。

en: Tadami is in Minamiaizu in Fukushima; cut off by steep mountains and located on the prefecture border with Niigata.
zh: 只见町位于福岛县的南会津，四面环山，就在和新潟县交界的地方。

en: I'm not interested in apologetics.
zh: 我对那些辩解性的言论没兴趣。

en: Even if we don't get lucky on the first try we can just keep fucking till I get pregnant.
zh: 就算第一次没怀上，咱们也可以一直做，直到我怀上为止。

en: You won't trick her; she knows a thing or two.
zh: 你骗不了她的，她精着呢。

en: That was a nifty way of doing it.
zh: 那招儿挺高明的。

en: We are making advance plans for our holidays.
zh: 我们正在提前规划假期。

en: There can be no people who have gone through as many hardships this century as the Jews.
zh: 本世纪恐怕没有哪个民族像犹太人那样经历过如此多的苦难。

en: It's talking about how, thanks to air transport, we've lost the sense of 'season' for foodstuffs.
zh: 这说的是多亏了航空运输，我们对食物的“季节感”都变淡了。

en: If I was going to the African continent where would be the safest and most sanitary place?
zh: 如果要去非洲大陆，哪里最安全、卫生条件最好？

en: You're pretty late to have just gone shopping. Have you been making out someplace?
zh: 只是去买个东西也太晚了吧。是不是在哪儿跟人亲热呢？

en: If you can translate the subject and object then after that it isn't so difficult.
zh: 只要能把主语和宾语翻译出来，剩下的就不难了。

en: Let's master example sentences and the make-up of text by dictation.
zh: 咱们通过听写来掌握例句和文章结构吧。

en: My life changed, sparked by meeting Mr Matsukawa.
zh: 以结识松川先生为契机，我的生活发生了改变。

en: You couldn't tell it by looking, but she has the legendary tale of having eaten two whole cakes when a child.
zh: 看不出来吧，她小时候可是有过一口气吃掉两个大蛋糕的“光辉事迹”。

en: I wanted to help, but there was nothing I could do.
zh: 我倒是想帮忙，可实在是无能为力。

en: It's a fiddle going to and fro between the keyboard and mouse so are there shortcuts to allow operation using only the keyboard?
zh: 在键盘和鼠标之间换来换去的太麻烦了，有没有那种只靠键盘操作的快捷键？

en: Skiing, barbecues, parties: with this plan you get the best of everything and can enjoy it all on a one-day visit.
zh: 滑雪、烧烤、派对：这个方案能让你在一天之内玩个遍。

en: ERROR: No body text!
zh: 错误：没有正文内容！

en: Losing my daughter has taken away my will to live.
zh: 失去女儿让我失去了活下去的动力。

en: This bow has a strong draw.
zh: 这张弓的拉力很大。

en: Drying the washing on a fine day in the rainy season; I felt like it was already summer.
zh: 在梅雨季的晴天晾衣服，感觉夏天已经到了。

en: After dark clouds, you get periods of refreshing clear weather.
zh: 乌云过后，总会迎来清爽的晴天。

en: Actually, there are many cases where 'have [object] done' is not causative.
zh: 实际上，“have [object] done”这种结构在很多情况下并不表示使役。

en: Obviously the teacher can understand both English and French.
zh: 老师显然既懂英语也懂法语。

en: It's not like I've got any special interest in gym shorts - I've not got that fetish, I think.
zh: 我对那种运动短裤也没什么特别的兴趣，应该没那种癖好。

en: You need permission to put up that sort of poster, and, most of all, you're ruining the looks of the street!
zh: 贴那种海报得经过许可，而且最重要的是，你这破坏了街道的美感！

en: That means nothing if English speakers don't understand it.
zh: 如果说英语的人听不懂，那这也没什么意义。

en: '-osity' is an abstract noun word ending created from the ending of an '-ous' adjective.
zh: "-osity" 是把以 "-ous" 结尾的形容词变成抽象名词的后缀。

en: You just have to understand what sort of thing the suffix '-osity' is.
zh: 你只需要明白 "-osity" 这个后缀到底是怎么回事就行了。

en: By summit, do you mean the Group of Eight?
zh: 你说的峰会是指八国集团（G8）吗？

en: Of course I apologised, saying that the first appointment had priority.
zh: 我当然道歉了，说我有约在先，得先紧着那边的来。

en: He's just a normal junior high school student, not particularly intelligent.
zh: 他只是个普通的初中生，不算特别聪明。

en: The threat increases; a defence that doesn't evolve is meaningless.
zh: 威胁在不断增加，不进化的防御毫无意义。

en: Write two expressions that are followed by either count or non-count nouns in conversation.
zh: 写出两个在口语中后面既可以接可数名词也可以接不可数名词的表达方式。

en: She studied hard in order not to fail the entrance exam.
zh: 为了入学考试不落榜，她学习非常刻苦。

en: I'd like to ask a grammarian, isn't it possible to think of 'be + participle' like you do V C and such?
zh: 我想请教一下语法专家，能不能把 “be + 分词” 看作像 V C 那样的结构？

en: "We've got taller so they don't fit." "Right, it's certainly not that we've got fat!" "The useful phrase 'grown up' is our trump card."
zh: “我们长高了，所以衣服不合身了。”“对啊，绝对不是因为长胖了！”“‘长大了’真是个万能的借口。”

en: It is said that the castle dates back to the 11th century.
zh: 据说这座城堡可以追溯到 11 世纪。

en: Also, those of you who don't have the chance to wear a 'kimono', go for it and wear one!
zh: 还有，没机会穿和服的各位，一定要趁机穿一下试试！

en: MP (magic): Ability score needed to use magic. As you use magic it drops, but with time it recovers.
zh: MP（魔力）：施展魔法所需的数值。使用魔法会减少，但会随时间恢复。

en: That young couple are still tied to their parent's apron strings.
zh: 那对小两口还没断奶呢，什么事都靠父母。

en: The Internet has a lot of information and thus also a lot of useless information.
zh: 网上的信息很多，但没用的垃圾信息也很多。

en: It's embarrassing to be seen without make-up so please don't stare.
zh: 素颜被看到挺尴尬的，所以请别盯着我看。

en: Obviously we will help but please remember that what decides it in the end is your zeal.
zh: 我们当然会帮忙，但请记住，最后起决定作用的是你自己的热忱。

en: I'll leave you to lock up.
zh: 锁门的事就交给你了。

en: There was a class reunion after 30 years.
zh: 三十年后，我们办了一次同学聚会。

en: Your wonderful lecture was pearls before swine.
zh: 你那精彩的讲座简直是给他们对牛弹琴。

en: You can't ask us to believe this.
zh: 你不能要求我们相信这种事。

en: Ontogeny recapitulates phylogeny.
zh: 个体发育重演种系发生。

en: It's scary how little consideration she gives to being a woman.
zh: 她一点身为女性的自觉都没有，想想真可怕。

en: Take that back, right now!
zh: 把那话收回去，现在立刻！

en: Say ... I can hear screams coming from the women's bath.
zh: 那个……我好像听到女浴室那边有尖叫声。

en: This is an early work, I did it freely without storyboarding so it's unreasonably long.
zh: 这是早期的作品，当时没画分镜就随性画了，所以长得有点离谱。

en: The addict died from a drug overdose.
zh: 那个瘾君子死于吸毒过量。

en: Let us pray for a perfect, an eternal, peace.
zh: 让我们为持久、永恒的和平祈祷吧。

en: Apparently they aren't given, but loaned.
zh: 听说是借给他们的，不是送的。

en: Depending on which you think of as the main point, either is OK.
zh: 看你觉得哪一点才是重点，选哪个都行。

en: They don't use 'celeb' to mean 'rich man' over there. By which I determine that you are Japanese.
zh: 那边不用 “celeb” 来指代有钱人，所以我断定你是日本人。

en: What you don't see and hear with your own ears and eyes might be true, but it might also not be true.
zh: 没亲眼见到、亲耳听到的事，可能是真的，也可能是假的。

en: C is formed by reacting A with B.
zh: C 是由 A 和 B 反应生成的。

en: It is strange that a cameraman heading for a war-zone should not know about the danger of unexploded shells. The newspaper company is being negligent in its training.
zh: 前往战区的摄影师竟然不知道未爆炸弹的危险，这太奇怪了。报社的培训也太不负责任了。

en: It was evening and already dark but I saw a cat walking along a telephone wire. Can they do that, cats?
zh: 天快黑了，但我看见一只猫在电线上走。猫真的能办到这种事吗？

en: Low-fat milk for me.
zh: 给我来份低脂奶。

en: "What? Are you doubting us?" "B-but, that is, suddenly 'spirit world', 'magical beings' - it's strange to ask me to believe."
zh: “什么？你怀疑我们？”“但、但是，这也太突然了，什么‘精神世界’、‘魔导生物’的，让我一下子怎么相信啊。”

en: We, ACME Ltd., hereby announce that we will resist with all our strength this hostile takeover.
zh: 我们 ACME 公司特此宣布，我们将竭尽全力抵制这次恶意收购。

en: Sorry, that's a typo.
zh: 抱歉，那是笔误。

en: It seems I've got a little tipsy. Sorry to have talked rubbish...
zh: 我好像有点喝高了。不好意思，刚才净胡言乱语了……

en: I'm not bothered. It's just my usual nightcap. Having someone to drink with on occasion might be nice.
zh: 我没关系的。这只是我平时的睡前酒。偶尔有人陪着一起喝也挺好的。

en: We ask that those who have had a change to their residence report and have not yet submitted a change report please do so as quickly as possible.
zh: 如果您的居住地有变动但还没提交变更报告，请尽快办理。

en: I arrived home, thoroughly worn out, after getting lost in the mountain paths.
zh: 我在山里迷了路，回到家时已经筋疲力尽了。

en: Let's take precautions against heat fatigue, before we flake out from the heat, and have a healthy summer.
zh: 在被热晕之前，咱们先做好防暑措施，过个健康的夏天。

en: Hiroshi is worn out with worry since he lost the only copy of the book he needed for his report.
zh: 浩把写报告要用的唯一一本参考书弄丢了，现在愁得人都憔悴了。

en: These cancellations without notice are a real pain.
zh: 这种招呼都不打就临时取消，真的很让人头疼。

en: Up to now he had made nine humanoid robots but they were all demonstration models.
zh: 到目前为止他已经做了九个仿人机器人，但都是些演示机。

en: A normal person might spend a lifetime at it and still not succeed but faced with a determined Ren it was not greatly different from a normal cylinder lock.
zh: 普通人可能花上一辈子也未必能成功，但在下定决心的莲面前，这和普通的弹子锁也没什么两样。

en: The former president of a certain association has been arrested on suspicion of breach of trust.
zh: 某协会的前会长因涉嫌背信罪被逮捕了。

en: The exhortation "Don't quote Wikipedia" was included in the Asahi newspaper of yesterday or the day before.
zh: 昨天或前天的《朝日新闻》登了这么一句话：“别引用维基百科”。

en: There was a statement in the Asahi newspaper yesterday or the day before stressing that you shouldn't quote Wikipedia.
zh: 昨天或前天的《朝日新闻》里有个说法，强调不要引用维基百科。

en: Astronomers inferred the existence of a local supercluster.
zh: 天文学家推断存在一个本超星系团。

en: Apply a compress to the affected part every two hours.
zh: 每两小时给患处敷一次。

en: Last week's snow was limited to a very small area.
zh: 上周的雪只下在了很小的范围内。

en: It was embarrassing the way my parents bragged about me at the concert.
zh: 我爸妈在音乐会上那样夸我，弄得我挺尴尬的。

en: As I left the brothel, I was embarrassed to be seen by my friends.
zh: 我从妓院出来的时候被朋友撞见了，真尴尬。

en: Thank you for waiting. One kid's meal and an ice cream soda.
zh: 久等了。一份儿童餐，一杯冰激凌苏打。

en: Please ensure the genitals are obscured by a mosaic effect.
zh: 请务必给生殖器打上马赛克。

en: Men are absolutely not allowed to post or reply to articles.
zh: 严禁男性发帖或回帖。

en: WARNING - 18+ ONLY.
zh: 警告：未满18岁禁止入内。

en: Like the banner, the design was based around the colour white.
zh: 和横幅一样，这个设计也是以白色为主色的。

en: Already three years since I became an office lady. It's not as if I'm dissatisfied with my present lifestyle but, well ...
zh: 当了三年上班族了。倒也不是对现在的生活不满意，只是……

en: When I looked at the explanatory notes under the posts list I realized what was causing it.
zh: 我看了下帖子列表下面的说明，才知道是怎么回事。

en: "May I have one as well?" "Yes, certainly. Today's on the company after all."
zh: “我也能要一个吗？”“当然可以，反正今天公司请客。”

en: "Bye, see you tomorrow." "Oh, what's this? Leaving on the dot again?"
zh: “走了，明天见。”“哟，这就走啦？又是准点下班啊？”

en: You can't believe a word of that.
zh: 那话你一个字都别信。

en: He squashed up a bit to the side to leave a seat free.
zh: 他往旁边挤了挤，空出一个座儿来。

en: Mountain fires are thought of causing little harm with the only damage being the burning of trees and shrubs, but actually there's a hell of a 'hidden character'.
zh: 大家都以为山火没什么大碍，顶多烧点儿树木，其实这事儿后患无穷。

en: I wonder how many times I've come here with her.
zh: 我在想，我跟她到底来过这儿多少次了。

en: I paid at the appropriate time.
zh: 我在合适的时候付了款。

en: Among these views, the second one is of importance.
zh: 在这些观点中，第二个比较重要。

en: Whatever you do don't leave the lid up on the toilet!
zh: 不管怎样，用完马桶千万记得把盖子放下！

en: Of these it is the latter one that is important.
zh: 这些当中，后面那个才是重点。

en: You will receive a confirmation email after your account has been activated by an administrator.
zh: 管理员激活您的账号后，您会收到一封确认邮件。

en: It is the drop in the rice pricing (blamed on consumers' loss of interest in rice and the freeing up of the international market) that is the cause.
zh: 原因是米价下跌了（归咎于消费者不爱吃米饭以及国际市场的开放）。

en: She plays Bach.
zh: 她弹巴赫的曲子。

en: VISUACT supports flexibly the varied environments and needs of our customers and offers a variety of operational procedures.
zh: VISUACT 灵活支持客户的各种环境和需求，并提供多种操作流程。

en: With this tutorial you will use the sample manga to become accustomed to the procedures for seeing the manga including download.
zh: 通过本教程，你可以利用漫画样本来熟悉查看漫画（包括下载）的流程。

en: Apparently the iPod nano has good sound.
zh: 听说 iPod nano 的音质还不错。

en: I don't always get up early.
zh: 我不总是起那么早。

en: With the development of networks a huge and unprecedented volume of messages flies around the world.
zh: 随着网络的发展，前所未有的巨量信息在全世界飞速传播。

en: And then I breathe a sigh from melancholy in being unable to do anything about it.
zh: 然后我因为对此无能为力而感到郁郁寡欢，叹了口气。

en: He didn't intend to let her drive but she pestered him so much that he finally gave in.
zh: 他本不想让她开车，但她一直磨他，他最后只好答应了。

en: In the font business you must never trust anybody!
zh: 在字体行业，你谁都不能信！

en: Her nature is neither affected nor pretentious.
zh: 她的性格既不造作也不虚伪。

en: Packed into wooden fishing boats like sardines, the immigrants undergo the dangerous voyage there.
zh: 移民们像沙丁鱼一样挤在木头渔船里，踏上这段危险的旅程。

en: My head's still pounding but I don't have a temperature any more.
zh: 我头还疼得厉害，但已经不发烧了。

en: The further I went the more irresistible became the feeling that I was going round and round in circles.
zh: 我越走越觉得不对劲，总觉得自己在原地打转。

en: Because, no matter if we have got lost, I'd hate to sleep outside this sort of place.
zh: 因为就算咱们迷路了，我也不想在这种鬼地方露宿。

en: If I wasn't here, this office would be in chaos in three days.
zh: 要是没我在这儿，这办公室不出三天就得乱套。

en: Sheesh, you've even got cigarette butts scattered around.
zh: 啧，你这儿连烟头都散了一地。

en: Please don't do translations if you're crap at it. This is a plea from the English translation clients.
zh: 水平不行就别翻译，算我们这些客户求你了。

en: The orchardist grafted an apple bud onto the rootstock.
zh: 果农把一个苹果芽嫁接到了砧木上。

en: He found it very hard to keep the conversation going.
zh: 他觉得很难把天儿聊下去。

en: It's a job worth doing, but if I think about the working hours and the risk ... I could be onto a real losing proposition here.
zh: 这活儿倒是值得一做，但一想到工时和风险……我觉得这买卖亏大了。

en: "How is it?" "Well, yes ... could be some signs of dehydration."
zh: “怎么样？”“嗯……看起来有点脱水的迹象。”

en: Kyoko, startled by the lightning, clung onto me.
zh: 京子被雷声吓了一跳，紧紧地抱住了我。

en: Well it's very difficult changing jobs after you're thirty so I don't really want to do it.
zh: 过了三十岁再换工作挺难的，所以我其实不想折腾。

en: In the morning, I just want to have a leisurely start.
zh: 早上我只想悠闲地开始这一天。

en: When indicating 'tense' in Chinese, as shown above, there are 'particles', 'time-specifying words' and also many cases where it depends on context.
zh: 就像上面提到的，中文在表达“时态”时，会用到“助词”、“时间词”，还有很多情况是靠语境的。

en: "Morning. You're early today." "You too. I thought you'd still be dead to the world."
zh: “早啊，你今天够早的。” “你也是。我还以为你还在梦周公呢。”

en: In order to bring out your talents to the full you need to a profession more suited to you, to find a new work place.
zh: 为了充分发挥你的才干，你得找个更适合你的职业，换个新环境。

en: The number of *****s in the hint has no relation to the number of characters in the word.
zh: 提示里的星号数量跟单词的字数没有关系。

en: Well sports day is over too, next the midterms ...
zh: 运动会也结束了，接下来就是期中考试了……

en: "My metabolism is such that no matter how much I eat I don't put on weight." "Just now, this second, you've made enemies of people throughout the world."
zh: “我是那种怎么吃都不长肉的体质。” “就在刚才这一秒，你已经成了全世界的公敌。”

en: Don't you find yourself reaching for things with '20% extra' written on them?
zh: 你看到写着“加量20%”的东西，是不是就不由自主想去拿？

en: In any case I just want to make clear that the fact that these are not normal people.
zh: 总之，我就是想挑明，这些人可不是什么正常人。

en: Spoilers ahead! If you don't mind that then read after highlighting (colour inverting).
zh: 下面有剧透！如果不介意的话，请反白查看内容。

en: And so everything ends up coming down on Mai's shoulders.
zh: 结果到头来，所有的担子都落在小麻衣肩上了。

en: You've already drunk mummy's milk. Don't cry, please go sleepy-sleep.
zh: 妈妈的奶也喝过了。不哭了，乖乖睡觉觉哦。

en: You're an arrogant dirty foreigner who claims your dictionary is correct even though you don't understand the nuances of Japanese.
zh: 你这个傲慢自大的洋鬼子，明明不懂日语的细微差别，还非说你的词典是对的。

en: I've heard about it. Your parents disappeared, running out on their debt didn't they?
zh: 我都听说了。你爸妈欠了一屁股债跑路了，对吧？

en: In short, he's run off without paying off his debt.
zh: 简单来说，他就是欠债跑路了。

en: What does destroying evidence get you? The usual thing would be to contact the police, wouldn't it?
zh: 销毁证据图什么呀？正常来说应该报警吧？

en: "Where's that superstition from?" "Call it folk wisdom."
zh: “哪儿来的这种迷信？” “这叫民间智慧。”

en: You must have some nerve to ignore _me_.
zh: 胆子不小啊，居然敢无视我。

en: A load of 100 kilograms is the max.
zh: 限重100公斤。

en: Never mind that. More importantly, if we don't go soon the time-limited sales will finish.
zh: 先别管那个了。重要的是，再不走限时打折就要结束了。

en: One more thing. If you try anything on Mayu I'll break your spine.
zh: 还有一件事。要是你敢对小真由动手动脚，我就打断你的脊梁骨。

en: "But we're brother and sisters, aren't we?!" "In name we are."
zh: “可我们不是亲兄妹吗？！” “名义上是。”

en: Even so ... she didn't have to slap me!
zh: 就算这样……她也没必要扇我耳光啊！

en: Having said it, Mayu hangs her head in embarrassment.
zh: 说完这句话，真由害羞地低下了头。

en: "The old lady of this shop is very unsociable but ..." "Taiki, I can hear you!" "Ack!"
zh: “这家店的老板娘性格挺孤僻的，不过……” “大树，我可听着呢！” “额！”

en: It's a good idea to stop using direct-links to files. Use a trick like starting the URL with double-width h t t p or something.
zh: 最好别直接放文件链接。耍个小手段，比如在URL开头用全角的ｈｔｔｐ之类的。

en: To get up in the morning, and there be someone to say good morning to - I haven't had this feeling for a long time.
zh: 早上起来有人能互道早安，这种感觉好久都没有过了。

en: You say you had a nibble, it looked to me like you'd polished it off.
zh: 你说你就尝了一口，我看你明明是把它吃个精光。

en: Please ensure you always include a link-back in your replies. ">>" in plain ASCII + number (e.g. >>1).
zh: 回复时请务必带上引用链接。用半角符号“>>”加数字（比如>>1）。

en: Well you're always putting on a show, and you're always on guard.
zh: 谁让你老是装模作样，还总是疑神疑鬼的。

en: However, although our companions were willing, they knew nothing about management or getting money.
zh: 不过，虽然同伴们挺积极的，但对经营或者赚钱的事儿一窍不通。

en: What do you think? Does it suit me? It's what servants wear around here.
zh: 你觉得怎么样？适合我吗？这一带的下人都穿这个。

en: Please hold the line so as not to lose your place in the queue.
zh: 请不要挂断，以免失去排队位置。

en: A strong veteran, having trained for tens of years, can fall to a weakling in a moment of laxness. That's what the martial arts world is.
zh: 苦练几十年的老江湖，也会因为一时的疏忽栽在无名小卒手里。这就是武林。

en: Good timing. I'll get you to test drive the new model.
zh: 赶得早不如赶得巧。正好，你来试驾一下这款新车。

en: Crawl forward is done much more agilely - scuttle like a cockroach!
zh: 往前爬得再灵巧点——像蟑螂一样窜起来！

en: "Let's see, you're ... er, um ... M-" "You're wrong from the first letter!!"
zh: “我看看，你是……额，那个……M……” “从第一个字母起就错了！！”

en: Ladies and Gentlemen, thanks to your untiring efforts our hideout is finally complete!!
zh: 各位，多亏了大家的坚持不懈，我们的秘密基地终于建成了！！

en: Hi Mr Ant, keeping up the good work today as well. Here's a sugar cube.
zh: 嗨，蚂蚁先生，今天也在努力工作呀。给你块方糖。

en: "Now that I think of it, where's Tanimoto?" "Playing the lone wolf, as always."
zh: “说起来，谷本去哪儿了？” “还是老样子，独来独往的。”

en: "If you don't get in our way any more, I could see my way to letting bygones be bygones." "That's remarkably generous ..."
zh: “要是你们不再捣乱，我可以考虑既往不咎。” “那可真是太慷慨了……”

en: He says he avoided the danger by playing dead.
zh: 他说他是靠装死才躲过一劫的。

en: India has a cuisine rich in regional flavour.
zh: 印度菜的地域风味非常丰富。

en: What I looked up to in Shota was not his 'strength'. It was his heroic courage to put his life on the line to carry out his convictions.
zh: 我崇拜祥太的并不是他的“强大”，而是他那种为了坚持信念不惜拼上性命的英勇。

en: It goes without saying that at that time a kind of friendship beyond master and disciple grew between the two of them.
zh: 毋庸置疑，那时他们两人之间产生了一种超越师徒的情谊。

en: When I see typos I lose interest in answering.
zh: 一看到错别字，我就没兴致回答了。

en: At the time there were no native English speakers teaching in any public school.
zh: 当时，任何一所公立学校都没有母语是英语的老师。

en: Apprenticeship is a system where you eat, sleep and live with your master and are taught various martial arts know-how and secrets.
zh: 这种学徒制是和师父同吃同住，学习各种武术门道和秘籍的制度。

en: I'm begging you, before freaking out on me listen to the end of what I have to say.
zh: 我求你了，先别急着发火，听我把话说完行吗？

en: Which will he choose, I wonder, martial arts or death?
zh: 他在想选哪一个呢，是武术，还是死？

en: Quit your bellyaching. You goin' to do it, or not!?
zh: 别在这儿抱怨了。你就说干不干吧？！

en: You're Daisho? Up till now you've really lorded it over us haven't you?
zh: 你就是大将？一直以来你都在我们头上作威作福啊。

en: They also teach that, for great sins, they cannot receive forgiveness unless they confess to their leader.
zh: 他们还教导说，犯了大罪的人，除非向头领忏悔，否则无法获得宽恕。

en: The act known as terrorism, that rips away from us in an instant our peaceful days of happiness, is certainly worthy of being called an enemy to all mankind.
zh: 恐怖主义这种瞬间夺走我们平静幸福生活的行为，绝对称得上是全人类的敌人。

en: However not attacking your partner in sparring is not a kindness!
zh: 但在对练时不对对手发起攻击，这可不是什么温柔！

en: It's geared pretty much towards real fighting isn't it? Apart from the eyes, crotch, and attacks against fallen opponents just about anything goes ...
zh: 这基本上是面向实战的吧？除了眼睛、裆部和攻击倒地的对手，差不多什么都可以……

en: One month since entering high school ... not a single friend yet. That's really terrible, at this rate it will be middle-school all over again!!
zh: 高中开学已经一个月了……一个朋友都没有。太惨了，这样下去初中的悲剧又要重演了！！

en: Oh no! I'm late again!! I'm going to get the nickname 'King of Late arrival'.
zh: 糟了！又迟到了！！我会被人起个“迟到大王”的绰号的。

en: Don't dodge the issue, I want you to answer my question.
zh: 别回避话题，我要你回答我的问题。

en: Crutches are pretty tricky ... "Excuse me, stretcher coming through!"
zh: 拐杖还挺难弄的……“不好意思，担架经过！”

en: You're a waste of breath!
zh: 跟你说话简直是浪费口舌！

en: I sit down crosslegged where Aoi points.
zh: 我在葵指的地方盘腿坐了下来。

en: "That's an unusual hobby she's got, the transfer student." "She's cute so it's fine with me."
zh: “那个转校生的爱好还挺奇特的。”“反正她长得可爱，我没意见。”

en: What! You going to take her side again!?
zh: 什么！你又要偏袒她了吗！？

en: Even walking till my legs turned to lead I couldn't find one that I liked.
zh: 就算走到腿沉得像灌了铅一样，我还是没找到中意的。

en: I don't expect him to understand my innermost thoughts but I wonder what I can do to get him to hold an interest.
zh: 我不指望他能理解我的内心，但怎么才能让他对我产生兴趣呢？

en: "Hey! It's dangerous to run here." "Eh? ... A-a-Aaah!!" "Oh dear, what did I tell you?"
zh: “喂！在这里跑很危险。”“诶？……啊啊啊！！”“哎呀，我不都告诉你了吗？”

en: For my multi-talented sister, able do anything with ease, it seems that my commonplace self is something whose existence she finds very hard to forgive.
zh: 对于那个无所不能的多才多艺的姐姐来说，我这个平凡人的存在似乎是她难以原谅的。

en: Just look! The potatoes are all rolling out! You're a real dullard aren't you?
zh: 你看！土豆都滚出来了！你真是个笨手笨脚的家伙。

en: Bing-bong ... bing-bong ... "Oh-oh. The class bell!"
zh: 叮咚——叮咚——“啊，上课铃响了！”

en: How late can I ring?
zh: 我最晚可以几点给你打电话？

en: Paul, we can borrow up to 8 books.
zh: 保罗，我们最多可以借8本书。

en: I'm not going to the library, but I can take you as far as the station.
zh: 我不去图书馆，不过我可以顺便送你到车站。

en: We're in a slump, barely scraping by, so we certainly don't have the margin to take on a part-time worker.
zh: 我们现在生意不景气，勉强糊口，实在没余力招兼职。

en: Essentially it's a one-to-one match, but the content of that match is a level so high as to be unthinkable to an ordinary person.
zh: 基本上是一对一的较量，但比赛内容的水准高到常人难以想象。

en: "Buy a lottery ticket or something?" "Well, I don't think I've got much luck with gambling."
zh: “买张彩票什么的？”“算了吧，我觉得我没什么赌运。”

en: "Are you going to buy a lottery ticket?" "I don't think I'm lucky at gambling."
zh: “你要买彩票吗？”“我觉得我没什么赌运。”

en: This autumn I am, unusually, watching many drama series.
zh: 这个秋天我破天荒地看了好几部剧。

en: To apply further analysis to documents and files matching the keywords and find the hidden truth is "knowledge".
zh: 对符合关键词的文件进行深入分析并找出隐藏的真相，这就是“知识”。

en: "What're you doing?" "The household books. Our finances are pretty tight so we have to do things properly."
zh: “你在干嘛？”“记账呢。咱们家手头紧，得算仔细点。”

en: Well then I'll allow two on a bike, but you pedal, because I'll ride on the rack.
zh: 那行，准你们两个人骑一辆车，但得你来蹬，因为我要坐在后座上。

en: "What is this? An offering?" "That's right. Put it in this offertory box ... and pull this rope."
zh: “这是什么？供品吗？”“没错。放进这个赛钱箱……然后拉一下这根绳子。”

en: Last week I was treated to dinner by my friend who'd won at pachinko. It was all-you-can-eat so I ate to my heart's content.
zh: 上周我朋友玩弹珠机赢了，请我吃了顿饭。是自助餐，所以我吃得超级满足。

en: OK, here's the donation ... 10 yen each. Here you go, Mihane.
zh: 好了，这是香油钱……每人10日元。给你，美羽。

en: Come on, get walking!
zh: 行了，快走吧！

en: What? You can't do it? You coward! Chicken!
zh: 什么？你不敢？你个胆小鬼！怂包！

en: "You mustn't be late, OK?" "But if the teacher's late too it doesn't count, right?"
zh: “你可不能迟到哦。”“但要是老师也迟到了，就不算数了吧？”

en: The servants gathered there totalled ... n-nearly one hundred!
zh: 聚集在那里的佣人总共有……快、快一百个人！

en: As we entered the shopping district Haruna's gaze darted about, just like she was a rustic from the hills, as she looked over the area.
zh: 走进商店街时，春奈就像个进城的乡巴佬一样，四处东张西望的。

en: Please do your model building at home! The room's full of the smell of lacquer.
zh: 请回家去做你的模型！屋里全是油漆味。

en: There's no way one that big is going to go on a bike's luggage rest.
zh: 那么大的东西，自行车后座根本放不下。

en: I quietly take out my camera, so as not to be noticed by my photographic subject, and peek through the finder.
zh: 为了不让拍摄对象发现，我悄悄拿出相机，凑近取景器。

en: First thing today there's an appointment for a portrait ... what do you say? Will you try doing it as a test?
zh: 今天第一件事是预约的人像摄影……怎么样？你要不要试着拍一张？

en: With that sort of attitude you'll never get past the honourable-mention prizes.
zh: 抱着这种态度，你永远也别想拿到佳作奖以上的奖项。

en: "Isn't it about time you tried photographing people or something?" "Eh? Snapshots? I don't know ..."
zh: “你也该试着拍拍人了吧？”“诶？街拍吗？我也不太确定……”

en: "Ryu, I can't seeee!" "Naturally, that's because I'm covering your eyes."
zh: “龙，我看不见啦！”“那是当然，因为我正捂着你的眼睛呢。”

en: ・ Corrected mistaken/missing characters in the text data.
zh: ・修正了文本数据中的错字和漏字。

en: Dammit, that pest Nagisa, she really went and snitched on me to the teachers.
zh: 该死，凪沙那个讨厌鬼，居然真的去跟老师告我状了。

en: Let's have a contest. The side to come up with the worst insult wins.
zh: 咱们来比赛吧，看谁骂得最难听谁就赢。

en: Get a move on!
zh: 动作快点！

en: She has a boyfriend she's been going out with since high school but feels their relationship has become a matter of habit and is increasingly dissatisfied.
zh: 她有个从高中开始交往的男朋友，但她觉得两人的关系已经变成了例行公事，感到越来越不满意。

en: She has a boyfriend she's been going out with since high school, but she feels their relationship has stagnated, so she's become dissatisfied.
zh: 她有个从高中就开始交往的男朋友，但她觉得感情进入了平淡期，所以变得有些不满。

en: She has a boyfriend she's been going out with since high school, but she feels their relationship is in a rut, so she's become discontented.
zh: 她跟高中就在一起的男朋友一直谈到现在，但觉得感情陷入了瓶颈，这让她挺不开心的。

en: It was I who found her. She'd lost consciousness so I carried her to the infirmary.
zh: 是我发现她的。当时她晕过去了，我就把她抱到了医务室。

en: Microfibre cloth is cloth woven from fibres as narrow as a hundredth of the width of a hair.
zh: 超细纤维布是用比头发丝还要细上一百倍的纤维织成的。

en: With a pitter-patter of footsteps she runs off to the entrance.
zh: 伴随着哒哒哒的脚步声，她跑向了玄关。

en: I am still clumsy catching batons thrown high up.
zh: 我现在接高空抛下来的接力棒还是笨手笨脚的。

en: There isn't anybody in front of the main gate yet.
zh: 正门口现在还没人。

en: The first thing that came to my attention was the large sofa. It was covered in sober coloured leather, the seat and the back both looked wide and comfortable.
zh: 我首先注意到的是那张大沙发，暗色调的皮革包裹着，坐垫和靠背看着都既宽敞又舒服。

en: The days after that flew past.
zh: 那之后的日子过得飞快。

en: It's said to be a girls' high school characterised by its quiet and traditional feel and a chic, high-class uniform.
zh: 听说那是一所很有传统气息、环境幽静的女高，校服也特别时尚高级。

en: Truthfully, if I'd said I didn't have any regrets over my snap decision I'd have been lying.
zh: 实话实说，要是说我对自己一时冲动做的决定一点儿也不后悔，那绝对是撒谎。

en: It's not a joke.
zh: 这可不是在开玩笑。

en: Ha-ha, you always stretch when class is over don't you?
zh: 哈哈，你下课以后总是会伸个懒腰，对吧？

en: We are now going to move to the crematorium so if Mr. Ogawa and you would enter the car ...
zh: 我们现在要出发去火葬场了，请小川先生和您上车吧。

en: A gift of cheesecake is apparently good to soothe discord.
zh: 听说送个芝士蛋糕挺能缓和矛盾的。

en: If you skip breakfast and keep lunch light, then in the evening you can have whatever you want.
zh: 要是你不吃早饭，午饭也吃得清淡点，那晚上就能想吃什么就吃什么了。

en: I think that as long as I don't overeat, I will certainly lose weight.
zh: 我觉得只要不暴饮暴食，肯定能瘦下来。

en: What on earth spurred them to such an action?
zh: 到底是什么让他们做出这种举动的？

en: I have to wrap my sister's dinner in clingfilm.
zh: 我得给我妹妹的晚饭裹上保鲜膜。

en: I need to wrap my older sister's dinner in plastic wrap.
zh: 我得给我姐姐的晚饭盖上保鲜膜。

en: In addition to the general curriculum there are tutorials in the essentials of machinery, training is also carried out for skills in and learning how to use the various types of machinery.
zh: 除了普通课程，还有机械基础辅导，也会进行各种机械操作技能的培训和学习。

en: There is a matter that we would like to discuss urgently regarding club activities, so please come to the staff room.
zh: 有关于社团活动的急事要商量，请来一趟教员室。

en: The exchange unfolding in front of my eyes had not a single millimetre of a gap in which for me to slip.
zh: 眼前展开的这场对话，根本没有我能插进去的余地。

en: "Ah ... I'm just not feeling so well" "Really? Are you OK?" "Heh-heh. Actually I'm playing hooky."
zh: “啊……我只是有点不舒服。”“真的吗？没事吧？”“嘿嘿，其实我是翘课了。”

en: It was to say that going to the station was too much of a bother after all so I should come to the hotel she's staying at. Good grief, what a selfish woman!
zh: 她最后说去车站到底还是太麻烦了，让我直接去她住的酒店找她。哎呀，真是个随心所欲的女人！

en: Then what is this I wonder? If it isn't dodgy door-to-door sales then could it be a new kind of pickup technique for the ladies?
zh: 那这到底是什么呢？如果不是可疑的上门推销，难道是某种针对女性的新型搭讪套路？

en: The other day, a water quality inspection was carried out at our house. We had it done by a certain famous company's Environment Analysis Center or some such name.
zh: 前些日子，家里做了一次水质检测，是请某家知名公司的环境分析中心之类的机构来做的。

en: "Well, it's hot again today, isn't it?" "That's one more time you've started with a bland topic."
zh: “哎呀，今天又这么热啊。”“你又用这种无聊的话题开头。”

en: It's just if we have it every day we're bound to get fed up with it. I must increase the variety of my cooking.
zh: 只是每天都吃这个肯定会腻的，我得多做点花样出来。

en: It's obvious but the connection between people is "words". It is by those words that thoughts are shared and arguments carried out.
zh: 虽然是显而易见的道理，但人与人之间的纽带就是“语言”。通过语言，思想得以交流，争论也随之产生。

en: I had imagined that the newbies fresh from university would probably be stuck with all the backstage work - collecting reference material, getting copies and such but I couldn't have been proved more wrong.
zh: 我原以为刚毕业的大学生肯定只能干些搜集资料、复印文件之类的杂活，但我完全想错了。

en: It's only manners to tackle all out a game that they have gone all out in creating. Pressing the pause button is just rude!
zh: 全力以赴去玩别人用心制作的游戏才是有礼貌的表现，按暂停键简直太没礼貌了！

en: Shall we go with cornflakes or something light from tomorrow?
zh: 从明天起，咱们早饭吃玉米片之类清淡点儿的东西好吗？

en: "Did I really sigh?" "While giving out an aura of unhappiness."
zh: “我真的叹气了吗？”“还带着一股很不爽的气场呢。”

en: There were long desks lined up, several pipe chairs, and stuck on the bulletin board were a calendar and several printouts.
zh: 屋里排着长桌和几把折叠椅，布告栏上贴着挂历和几张打印出来的材料。

en: "I might like to know about your relations with men." "Relations with men?" "Things like who you get on well with, who you've dated and such."
zh: “我想了解一下你的异性交往情况。”“异性交往？”“就是你和谁关系比较好，或者跟谁交往过之类的。”

en: Businesses perceive as competitors a narrow range of the business world; there are many cases where they don't understand their real rivals.
zh: 企业往往只盯着业内一小部分竞争对手，很多时候他们根本没搞清楚谁才是真正的对手。

en: That's because they're the classic places for 'something' to appear. Like the grand piano that plays by itself, the human anatomical model that moves by itself ...
zh: 那是因为那些地方是发生“灵异事件”的经典场所，比如会自动演奏的三角钢琴，还有会自己走动的人体解剖模型……

en: About the same time as he entered the classroom and arrived at his seat, the chime to announce class rings across the school.
zh: 就在他走进教室坐下的那一刻，上课铃声响彻了校园。

en: A certain movie was novelized - rather it was a scenario written for a movie that was expanded as a novel and localized to Japanese.
zh: 某部电影被改编成了小说——准确地说是为电影写的剧本被扩充成了小说，并翻译成了日文。

en: The girl, her eyes shining brightly from that single hint, makes her cute cat-motif automatic pencil run across her notebook.
zh: 那个女孩因为这点提示而眼睛发亮，拿着可爱的猫咪图案自动铅笔在笔记本上飞快地写着。

en: To keep holding the barrier up is just to wait for death! So we're going to go out past the wall and counter attack the enemy, you ready!?
zh: 光守着结界就是等死！所以我们要冲出墙外反击敌人，准备好了吗！？

en: There were figures there from those of an age best called girls and boys to those who looked to be old enough to be about to live out their life span.
zh: 那里的人形形色色，从小孩子到那种眼看就要寿终正寝的老人都有。

en: Light source, that is what direction the light is facing, also take care with shadowing. Just copy down into the sketch book you have at hand as accurately as possible.
zh: 注意光源，也就是光的方向，还要注意阴影的处理。尽可能准确地临摹到你手边的素描本上。

en: Despite having lazed around without having touched my work I'm frightened at heart that "Ooh-er, this time I might really not get done in time!?"
zh: 明明一直偷懒没碰工作，心里却在犯怵：“哎呀，这次该不会真的做不完了吧！？”

en: Hey, Cleo. Don't wander around too much, OK? We've only just entered the park.
zh: 嘿，克莱奥。别到处乱跑，好吗？咱们才刚进公园。

en: A creepy cry that sounds like a human voice, velvet black wings, the image of tearing into dead flesh; crows are known across the world as an ill-omened bird that flies down with ill-luck.
zh: 像人声一样诡异的叫声、漆黑的羽翼、啄食腐肉的形象——乌鸦作为带来厄运的不祥之鸟而闻名于世。

en: Not to be taken lightly, local amusement parks. Couples, families, as far as can be seen people, people, people.
zh: 地方上的游乐园也不能小看啊。全是情侣和家庭游客，一眼望去全是人，人，人。

en: Yes. I'm pretty sure there are complimentary tickets that haven't been used somewhere.
zh: 是的，我记得肯定还有没用过的赠票放哪儿了。

en: That'll cost thirty euros.
zh: 那个要三十欧元。

en: "By the way, do you know what a Shinto shrine is?" "I've a little bit of knowledge on the subject. It's a religious facility where that which is the object of worship, that called the genius loci, is enshrined."
zh: “哎，你知道神社是什么吗？”“略懂一点。那是一种宗教设施，供奉着被称为‘土地神’的祭祀对象。”

en: It's no joke! It's really a pain, you see.
zh: 这可不是开玩笑的！真的超麻烦。

en: "Good morning. You're a bit late today, aren't you?" "Yes, I ran into a bit of trouble."
zh: “早啊。今天你来得有点晚呢。”“是啊，遇上点麻烦。”

en: "Good morning. You're late today, aren't you?" "Yeah, I got a bit caught up."
zh: “早啊。今天迟到了吧？”“嗯，刚才有点事耽搁了。”

en: "Good morning. You were a bit late today." "Mhm, I got a tad delayed."
zh: “早。今天晚了一点。”“嗯，稍微耽搁了一会儿。”

en: Up till now America has called itself the world's police and continued suppression relying on military force.
zh: 直到现在，美国还自称是世界警察，一直靠武力进行镇压。

en: The woman dental hygienist said to me, lying down in the chair, "Right, please open your mouth."
zh: 牙科护士对我这个躺在椅子上的人说：“好了，请张嘴。”

en: As the lesson comes to an end, even if the teacher doesn't say "be quiet" or "sit down," the children naturally return to their seats and quieten down.
zh: 快下课的时候，就算老师不说“安静”或“坐好”，孩子们也会自然地回到座位上安静下来。

en: "Is that some sort of uniform?" "Oh right, it's because I play field hockey."
zh: “那是校服什么的吗？”“喔，这是因为我打曲棍球。”

en: It's the class bell. The pupils that had been around the school gate quickened their steps as one.
zh: 上课铃响了。校门口的学生们都整齐划一地加快了脚步。

en: The website's tagline has to let people know what that business does and how it differs from the competition.
zh: 网站的标语得让人一眼就知道这公司是做什么的，还有跟竞争对手有什么不同。

en: I want you to somehow resolve the situation as promptly and avoiding to cause trouble for my sister and those around us as much as possible.
zh: 我希望你能尽快解决这件事，尽量别给我姐和周围的人添麻烦。

en: The girl was carrying several books, not textbooks but thick hardback books.
zh: 那个女孩抱着几本书，不是课本，而是那种厚厚的精装书。

en: The girl was carrying several books. Not textbooks, but thick hardback books.
zh: 那个女孩抱着几本书。不是课本，而是厚厚的精装书。

en: You're considerate, but don't you think you should work a little more at understanding the subtleties of the human mind?
zh: 你人确实挺体贴的，但你不觉得你应该再多学学怎么揣摩人心吗？

en: If you're with me as a staff officer then I need you to bring a sense of danger with you to your work.
zh: 既然你要当我的参谋，工作时就得时刻保持危机感。

en: "That's dangerous, I'll clear it up." "It's OK ... Ouch!" "Look, didn't I tell you so?"
zh: “太危险了，我来收拾吧。”“没事啦……哎哟！”“你看，我就说吧？”

en: I've set the stage so now you just have to show some guts, OK?
zh: 台子我都给你搭好了，接下来就看你有没有胆量了，行吗？

en: The other day when I stopped by at a friend's house, it wasn't my friend that came out of the front door, but her husband.
zh: 前几天我去朋友家，结果出来的不是我朋友，而是她老公。

en: That's not what I meant. I'm not being sexist. Men and women are just different.
zh: 我不是那个意思。我没性别歧视，男女本来就不一样。

en: That's not what I mean. Sex discrimination, female discrimination, whatever, men and women are just different.
zh: 我不是这意思。管它叫性别歧视还是歧视女性，男女就是有区别。

en: That was another impressive fall-flat-on-your-face ... Hey, you alright, Sophie? Can you stand?
zh: 这一跤摔得可真够彻底的……嘿，苏菲，你没事吧？能站起来吗？

en: Even making an international phone call from a mobile, if it's Mobila then you can do it for 20 Yen per minute.
zh: 就算是用手机打国际长途，用Mobila的话一分钟也就20日元。

en: 3. If you do phone then hang up immediately, without following any instructions given.
zh: 3. 如果打了电话就立刻挂断，千万不要听从任何指令。

en: Beware of 'One Ring' malicious nuisance calls!!
zh: 谨防“响一声就挂”的恶意骚扰电话！！

en: If I'm to become a regular, I have to work twice as hard as the rest.
zh: 要想成为正式队员，我就得付出比别人多一倍的努力。

en: Haru's always been like that; he's very kind at heart.
zh: 阿阳一直那样，心肠特别软。

en: However often I phone I can't get through.
zh: 电话怎么打都打不通。

en: A-ha-ha ... sorry. I forgot my contacts, Unless I'm right here I can't see it.
zh: 哈哈……抱歉。我没戴隐形眼镜，离这么远根本看不清。

en: Oh, sorry for not noticing you. I can only see it (the game) from here.
zh: 啊，不好意思没看见你。我得站在这个位置才能看清楚。

en: Not wanting to boast but I've never got better than a 3 on my report card for home economics. Out of 10 that is.
zh: 不是我吹牛，我那家政课成绩单就没高过3分。满分可是10分啊。

en: This, appearing at first glance to be perfectly obvious, is actually very difficult.
zh: 这事儿乍一看挺简单的，其实难得很。

en: "Ah, this is my idiot son Takashi" "Eh-er, yes. (The late) Takashi, right?" "Fuusy, he isn't dead yet! Probably."
zh: “啊，这是我那个笨蛋儿子隆史。”“呃，是。是（已故的）隆史对吧？”“嘘！他还没死呢！大概吧。”

en: Shurrup! Don't make such a fuss over a little headache. I'm flat out of magical power - this is all your fault!
zh: 闭嘴！不就头疼嘛，别大惊小怪的。我魔力都用光了，全怪你！

en: I'd defeated the four sub-bosses and got through the damn long underground labyrinth.
zh: 我打败了四个小BOSS，总算穿过了那该死的巨长地下迷宫。

en: Hit up on the D-pad, and the background music will change as the background itself becomes the Demon King's castle....
zh: 按十字键的上，背景音乐就会变，背景也会变成魔王城……

en: Since my brother died suddenly two years ago, my sister-in-law has valiantly kept going the small jewellery store he left her.
zh: 自从我哥哥两年前猝逝，我嫂子就一直拼命守着他留下的那家小珠宝店。

en: My brother died suddenly two years ago. Since then, my sister-in-law has valiantly kept the small jewelery store he left her going.
zh: 我哥哥两年前突然去世了。从那以后，我嫂子就一个人坚强地经营着他留下的那家小珠宝店。

en: ... Aaah, just how am I supposed to cope with this I wonder?
zh: ……唉，我到底该拿这事儿怎么办才好啊？

en: We drop off our luggage in a small prefab hut and promptly start preparations.
zh: 我们把行李丢在简易板房里，马上就开始准备了。

en: The enemy behind us presently exists solely to cut off our retreat.
zh: 我们身后的敌人现在唯一的目的就是切断我们的退路。

en: "Well, even so my score is far above yours isn't it?" "What did you say!? If I was to go all out you'd be as nothing to me!"
zh: “就算这样，我的分数也比你高一大截吧？”“你说什么！？我要是认起真来，你根本不是个儿！”

en: Does the applicant have suitable abilities to carry out the job?
zh: 申请人有能力胜任这份工作吗？

en: There aren't many blokes that nice!
zh: 像他那么好的男人可不多见！

en: Guys that handsome are few and far between.
zh: 这么帅的小伙子可不常见。

en: OK, this next! The combination of this and this might be way sexy!
zh: 好，下一个！这两个搭在一起肯定超级性感！

en: I started to think I had behaved foolishly.
zh: 我开始觉得自己之前的行为挺蠢的。

en: You're late! Sheesh, dilly-dally dilly-dally ...
zh: 你迟到了！真是的，磨磨蹭蹭的……

en: Lightly weigh the tofu down, leave it for about 20 minutes then drain.
zh: 用重物稍微压一下豆腐，放个20分钟左右，然后把水沥干。

en: We're what they colloquially call a single mother family. I haven't seen my father's face.
zh: 我们家就是俗话说的单亲家庭。我压根就没见过我爸长啥样。

en: When I use contacts, my eyes feel dry and become red.
zh: 我一戴隐形眼镜，眼睛就又干又红。

en: "Remember here?" "It's where we gathered for going to school in groups."
zh: “记得这儿吗？”“这是我们以前集合一起上学的地方。”

en: Don't go back to sleep!
zh: 别睡回笼觉了！

en: "Situation report." "At present 4 in sight. At most probably 7. Holding small calibre arms."
zh: “汇报情况。”“目前看到四个。最多可能有七个。拿着小口径武器。”

en: In the darkness, I frantically reach out towards the receding figure.
zh: 黑暗中，我拼命伸手去够那个远去的背影。

en: I'm sure it's tough taking part in the activities of two clubs, but good luck!
zh: 参加两个社团肯定挺辛苦的，加油啊！

en: Well, for the practical problem, in the midst of those rumours flying around I'm surprised they've been able to keep that club running.
zh: 说实话，在这种流言蜚语满天飞的情况下，那个社团居然还能撑下去，真让我意外。

en: The stopcock's turned off.
zh: 截止阀关掉了。

en: The main tap is turned off.
zh: 水龙头总闸关了。

en: The main valve is turned off.
zh: 总阀门关了。

en: We're going to buy underwear. You're still not wearing underpants, are you?
zh: 我们要去买内衣。你还没穿内裤呢吧？

en: It's very easy to drink potato shochu now that the potato-like smell has been reduced to a low level through use of the latest biotechnology.
zh: 由于采用了最新的生物技术，土豆烧酒的味道没那么冲了，现在特别好入口。

en: "'Yuki', so you do put your own name in." "Yup, isn't that roleplaying's essence?"
zh: “‘雪’，你还真用了自己的名字啊。”“对啊，这不就是角色扮演的精髓吗？”

en: "Asami was bawling that you had kissed Sanada so" "I didn't bawl!"
zh: “麻美一直在那儿哭，说你亲了真田……”“我才没哭呢！”

en: By evening, a few clouds had formed.
zh: 到了傍晚，天边起了几朵云。

en: Just how well can masks block the, even smaller than pollen, yellow sand dust? I think it much more of a nuisance than pollen.
zh: 口罩真的能挡住那些比花粉还小的黄沙吗？我觉得这玩意儿比花粉麻烦多了。

en: "What's up? Fidgeting around in front of the house." "Um ... I was waiting for you to come back."
zh: “干嘛呢？在屋子前面转来转去的。”“那个……我在等你回来。”

en: What, you having bread again? I see you're still leading the same thrilling dietary life as ever.
zh: 怎么又吃面包？看来你的饮食生活还是一如既往的“精彩”啊。

en: No dirty jokes!
zh: 别讲荤段子！

en: Taking care of the excretory needs of a patient you've just met is a very demanding job.
zh: 照顾刚认识的病人排泄，可真是件辛苦活儿。

en: Groaning strangely she is hurling her overflowing passion onto the canvas!
zh: 她一边发出奇怪的呻吟，一边把满腔热血倾注在画布上！

en: It seems like it will take me a while to get accustomed to life here.
zh: 看来适应这里的生活还需要一段时间。

en: I've already had the entrance ceremony. It's a university alongside the same railway line.
zh: 开学典礼已经办过了。那所大学就在同一条铁路线边上。

en: Amazing! This moving a story is a first for me! It's truly an epic among epics!
zh: 太牛了！我还是头一回看到这么感人的故事！简直是史诗中的史诗！

en: The streets are in full Christmas mode - it's almost Christmas Eve.
zh: 街上全是圣诞节的气氛——马上就是平安夜了。

en: Conversations with the management, reports and such should be very freely interpreted into normal language.
zh: 跟管理层的谈话和报告什么的，得用大白话解释得通俗点。

en: I'll feed it to you so ... here, open wide.
zh: 我喂你吧……来，张嘴。

en: I also brought some gruel I made. It just needs warming up.
zh: 我还带了点我熬的粥，热一下就能吃。

en: That's pitiful ... don't put on such a death-bed voice from just a body slam.
zh: 太惨了吧……不就被撞了一下嘛，别整得跟要交代后事似的。

en: "Didn't you get married!?" "Oh, we split up. We broke our engagement."
zh: “你不是结婚了吗？！”“哦，分了。婚约也取消了。”

en: In Japan it's generally thought that Germany's water supply isn't suitable for drinking, but this is a mistake.
zh: 在日本，人们普遍认为德国的自来水不能直接喝，但其实这种想法是错的。

en: Why don't you try out getting a new Windows Media Player skin and changing the player's look?
zh: 你要不要试着给 Windows Media Player 换个皮肤，改改播放器的外观？

en: By the way, Ren. Should I take your hand? Every year you wander off.
zh: 对了，小莲。要我牵着你吗？你每年都会走丢。

en: The UFO, with a zigzag movement you couldn't think of as being a plane, flew off into the mountains in the east.
zh: 那个不明飞行物以一种完全不像飞机的之字形轨迹，飞向了东边的山里。

en: Are you OK for drinking water in an emergency?
zh: 遇到紧急情况，你这儿的饮用水够吗？

en: You mean you're short on fuck-buddies?
zh: 你的意思是，你缺炮友？

en: Newly weds but with a child? Yes, that's right - the son is from the father's former marriage. He's been divorced once.
zh: 刚结婚就有孩子了？对，没错——那是他爸跟前妻的孩子。他离过一次婚。

en: Now there are charms and talismans for your pet that you can have blessed.
zh: 现在连给宠物的御守和护身符都可以拿去祈福了。

en: Just because it's a "safe day" I'm not going to make out like monkeys without protection. Isn't it the duty of loving sex to take proper care of contraception?
zh: 不能因为是“安全期”就不戴套瞎搞。做好避孕不是这种事的底线吗？

en: Jigsaw refers to a fret saw - that's how the name's origin was derived.
zh: 拼图（Jigsaw）最初是指一种细锯——这就是这个名字的由来。

en: A 'commuting wife' is just what the name says, it's a form of marriage where the wife travels to her husband's side.
zh: “通勤妻子”顾名思义，就是一种妻子定期去丈夫那儿生活的婚姻形式。

en: Where did you come up with the idea that I'm familiar with robotics and such I wonder?
zh: 你到底是从哪儿觉得我对机器人之类的东西很精通的？

en: That's no good! You're tall so you've got to be in the forward defence.
zh: 那可不行！你长得高，必须得去前场防守。

en: Well, we're neighbours. I'll be popping over all the time.
zh: 反正我们是邻居，我会经常过来串门的。

en: I'm taking care of it. You can relax. You can rely on me.
zh: 我在处理了。你就放心吧，包在我身上。

en: Trust me. It'll be plain sailing.
zh: 相信我，肯定会一帆风顺的。

en: In fact, I've heard that long hair is more likely to go bald!
zh: 其实我听说，头发留得长的人更容易秃顶！

en: We introduce you to the entire line up of songs that made it into The Best Ten.
zh: 我们来介绍一下进入前十名的所有曲目。

en: We finally arrived at the ski hill... the snow had turned into rain.
zh: 终于到了滑雪场……结果雪已经变成雨了。

en: It was just a simple greeting, but somehow I got strangely tense.
zh: 明明只是打个简单的招呼，不知道为什么我却紧张得要命。

en: "I haven't got the time to keep up with you." "That's rather depressing."
zh: “我没功夫陪你折腾。”“那听起来挺让人郁闷的。”

en: "How did you break in without any lockpicks?" "The bathroom window was open."
zh: “没用开锁工具你咋进来的？”“浴室窗户开着呢。”

en: The third in the series was a level above the rest.
zh: 这个系列里的第三部比其他的都要强出一大截。

en: In short some guns have excellent security systems to prevent accidental firing (e.g. when dropped), others don't.
zh: 简单说，有的枪保险系统做得很好，能防止走火（比如掉地上的情况），有的就不行。

en: By 'Torii' you mean that red objet d'art at the top of the steps?
zh: 你说的‘鸟居’，是指台阶顶上那个红色的艺术品吗？

en: I sprang out of bed.
zh: 我从床上蹦了起来。

en: Well now. Are those words to be trusted I wonder?
zh: 哎呀，不知道这些话到底靠不靠谱呢？

en: "Let me get a sample," and she transferred part to a petri dish.
zh: “我取个样，”她说着把一部分移到了培养皿里。

en: Right, while we're taking a walk anyway, we could like go along the woodland path and enjoy a little stroll through the forest...
zh: 既然反正都要散步，咱们不如顺着林间小路走走，去森林里逛逛……

en: That's right, since we're taking a walk anyways, I wonder if we could spend a little time walking through the forest too...
zh: 对啊，既然反正要散步，咱们是不是也能顺便去森林里转转？

en: Is this bread's best-by OK?
zh: 这面包没过期吧？

en: After climbing Mt. Fuji, I got the inspiration for a poem.
zh: 爬完富士山，我突然有了写诗的灵感。

en: After climbing Mt Fuji I got the inspiration for a poem.
zh: 爬完富士山，我突然有了写诗的灵感。

en: You're pretty good with the lay of the land.
zh: 你对这一带的地形挺熟的嘛。

en: I added newspaper article frequency data to the 'Kanji list' function.
zh: 我在‘汉字列表’功能里增加了报纸文章的词频数据。

en: Please beware of fraudulent emails.
zh: 请大家警惕诈骗邮件。

en: It could be a trap; don't let your guard down.
zh: 可能是陷阱，千万别掉以轻心。

en: It could be a trap. Don't let your guard down.
zh: 可能是陷阱，千万别掉以轻心。

en: He opens his eyes so widely they tear at the corners.
zh: 他眼睛瞪得浑圆，眼角都快撑裂了。

en: That's a stylish hat you are wearing.
zh: 你戴的这顶帽子真时髦。

en: Nothing whatever is known of him.
zh: 大家对他这个人的情况一无所知。

en: We have no clue where he is.
zh: 我们完全不知道他人在哪儿。

en: I think it might be useful if you could add how to output the diphthongs (with small ya/yu/yo) and geminate consonants (with small tsu).
zh: 我觉得要是能把怎么输入拗音（小的ya、yu、yo）和促音（小的tsu）的方法也加上，应该会挺有用的。

en: Ryoko has a cute little face.
zh: 凉子长了一张可爱的小脸。

en: Have my eyes also started to fail?
zh: 难道我的眼睛也开始不好使了？

en: Theses! ... What I write are just my ramblings, they're just something like essays.
zh: 什么论文啊！……我写的都是些胡思乱想的东西，顶多算随笔。

en: Deaf people can converse in sign language.
zh: 听障人士可以用手语交流。

en: Don't grow old, grow wise!
zh: 别光长岁数，也要长点智慧！

en: Surpassing labour intensive, capital intensive, the age has shifted greatly to knowledge intensive.
zh: 时代早已跨越了劳动密集和资本密集阶段，正大步迈向知识密集型社会。

en: Spirits are to be found all over the world. This school was built upon the site of a shrine and thus there is a particular tendency for them to gather.
zh: 世界各地都有灵体。这所学校是建在神社旧址上的，所以它们特别容易聚在这儿。

en: I'll try giving the book "Reiko's Recommended" a quick skim read on the spot.
zh: 我这就把那本《玲子推荐》大致翻一下。

en: Correct it, as in example 1.2.
zh: 参照示例1.2进行修改。

en: The neighbor popped his head up over the wall for a moment.
zh: 邻居从墙头后面探出头来看了一眼。

en: Bamboo stands out in the woods.
zh: 竹子在林子里格外显眼。

en: What I want from Mr Hayashi is the effort required for his actions to live up to his words.
zh: 我希望林先生能拿出点实际行动，做到言行一致。

en: From an ethical point of view, the great principle of technology is "responsibility to the present" but the new way of thinking, "responsibility to the future" has emerged.
zh: 从伦理角度看，技术的核心准则是‘对当下负责’，但现在也出现了‘对未来负责’这种新思维。

en: A love story that unfolds between an unlikely pair, a public prosecutor from a good family and a modern high school girl.
zh: 一个出身名门的检察官和现代女高中生之间擦出火花的爱情故事。

en: I left part of the meal uneaten.
zh: 这顿饭我剩了一点儿没吃完。

en: There are wheels within wheels.
zh: 这事儿复杂着呢，一环扣一环的。

en: There's more to this than meets the eye.
zh: 这事儿没表面上看起来那么简单。

en: Explain exactly what the reasons are.
zh: 把具体原因解释清楚。

en: He was a man who was the very picture of her ideals.
zh: 他简直就是她心目中理想男性的化身。

en: Rina is in the home economics club. Her main activity is dressmaking.
zh: 莉奈参加了家政社，平时主要搞缝纫裁缝。

en: During the orgy Megumi ran naked round the lawn.
zh: 在狂欢派对上，惠赤身裸体地在草坪上乱跑。

en: They say it's on the wane, but it's still got something hasn't it?
zh: 都说这玩意儿快过时了，但看起来魅力依旧啊。

en: Please enjoy a calm time in a relaxed atmosphere beauty salon.
zh: 请在这家氛围轻松的美容院里享受一段宁静的时光吧。

en: I'm begging you, could you stop treating me like a pet?
zh: 求你了，能不能别总把我当宠物一样对待？

en: Next Monday and Tuesday are consecutive holidays.
zh: 下周一和下周二连着放假。

en: Next Monday and Tuesday are holidays.
zh: 下周一和周二放假。

en: On the way we dropped in at the shops and bought foodstuffs. They say well prepared means no worries.
zh: 我们在路上顺便去商店买了些吃的。毕竟有备无患嘛。

en: It looks well prepared but you see there'll be a slip somewhere.
zh: 看着准备得挺周全，但肯定还是会出岔子。

en: Looks, brains, reflexes, rich family and, for good measure, vice president of the student committee - in other words he's 'perfect'.
zh: 长得帅、脑子灵、反应快、家里还有钱，再加上还是学生会副主席，简直就是个“完美男人”。

en: Just to warn you in advance, today's blog is no fun.
zh: 先提醒你一下，今天的博客没什么意思。

en: In the evening I went out on safari again, at night I fell asleep hearing the grunting of the hippos.
zh: 傍晚我又去了一趟游猎，晚上听着河马的呼噜声睡着的。

en: Have you decided where you're going to go to study abroad?
zh: 你想好去哪儿留学了吗？

en: The Ariake Sea is one of the biggest tidelands in Japan.
zh: 有明海是日本最大的滩涂之一。

en: I'm very lucky to have been gifted with this 10,000 hit picture! Thank you so very much.
zh: 真的太幸运了，收到了这张一万点阅的纪念图！非常感谢。

en: Yuriko thoroughly enjoyed her occasional secret meetings with her lover.
zh: 百合子很享受偶尔跟情人私会的感觉。

en: Yumiko has a push-up bra.
zh: 由美子有一件聚拢型的内衣。

en: Yukiko is an innocent girl of tender years.
zh: 雪子是个年纪还小、天真无邪的女孩。

en: The box was crushed during transport and the contents flew out.
zh: 快递箱子在运输过程中被压扁了，里面的东西都漏了出来。

en: The question of worshipping at the Yasukuni Shrine is left to the independent judgement of Cabinet ministers.
zh: 是否参拜靖国神社由阁僚们自主决定。

en: If you break your promise we're through, right?
zh: 你要是敢食言，咱俩就完了，懂吗？

en: Our aim is that, when planning classes, we know how to select stimulating material for the students and how to put it into use.
zh: 我们的目标是，在设计课程时知道怎么挑选能调动学生兴趣的素材，并把它们用好。

en: It stopped short at a result far from the 10% taken as the target.
zh: 结果离10%的目标差得远。

en: The object is that which in Japanese would generally be indicated with "ni" or "o".
zh: 宾语在日语里通常是用助词“ni”或者“o”来表示的。

en: If your licence exceeds its validity period then you can be issued with a new licence in the following way.
zh: 如果驾照过期了，可以按以下步骤换发新证。

en: Even while I was dithering it's like I was being backed further and further into a corner.
zh: 就在我犹豫不决的时候，感觉自己越来越被逼到绝境了。

en: Tomorrow night, I am going to Narita airport.
zh: 我明晚要去成田机场。

en: Tomorrow, I've got an important mission first thing in the morning. I shouldn't be wasting my time with this.
zh: 明天一大早就有重要的任务，我不该在这儿瞎耽误工夫。

en: Man can't live without dreams.
zh: 人活着不能没有梦想。

en: How about tomorrow?
zh: 明天怎么样？

en: We plan to elicit opinions from the public.
zh: 我们打算征求一下公众的意见。

en: Taeko, come on from stage left.
zh: 妙子，从舞台左侧上场。

en: My heart pounded at the future excitement.
zh: 一想到接下来的那些精彩，我的心就扑通扑通跳。

en: They seem a little past their peak, but even so we enjoyed the beautiful cherry blossoms.
zh: 樱花好像已经开过了最盛的时候，不过我们还是玩得挺开心的。

en: Pitching camp on sand banks that go under at high tide is a truly stupid thing to do.
zh: 在涨潮时会被淹没的沙洲上扎营，简直是脑子进水了。

en: Today is our regular closing day.
zh: 今天是我们的公休日。

en: Today, after riding, while grooming the horse I carelessly got my right foot trod on.
zh: 今天骑完马刷马的时候，一不小心右脚被马给踩了。

en: Thank goodness it didn't worsen. But please don't push yourself yet.
zh: 谢天谢地没变严重，但你现在还是别太勉强了。

en: The shirt she apparently seriously thought suited me I turned down and decided to accept a light blue polo shirt.
zh: 她觉得特别适合我那件衬衫我没要，最后拿了件浅蓝色的Polo衫。

en: Reproduction or appropriation of HTML, images and photographs from within this site is prohibited.
zh: 本站内的HTML、图片及照片严禁转载或挪用。

en: I'm a high school graduate so I am that much able to answer high school problems and such.
zh: 我好歹也是高中毕业，回答高中的题目还是不在话下的。

en: Only my seat is cut off from that bustle.
zh: 只有我这座位显得格外清静。

en: It's a guest room equipped with soundproofing with an emphasis on privacy.
zh: 这是一个注重私密性、带隔音设备的客房。

en: Mom sighed, and tousled the hair of her son's head.
zh: 妈妈叹了口气，揉了揉儿子的头发。

en: If I tell my mother, she'll worry, so I don't think I'll tell her.
zh: 跟我妈说她会担心的，所以我觉得还是先不告诉她了。

en: When inserting the budwood into the root stock make the cambium layer overlap.
zh: 把接穗插入砧木时，一定要让形成层对齐。

en: Yasunori leaned into the armrest and looked in bemusement at the breakfast laid before him.
zh: 康德靠在扶手上，一脸困惑地看着摆在眼前的早餐。

en: Aren't you paying for the damages in full?
zh: 难道你不打算全额赔偿损失吗？

en: If you piss on the toilet seat, wipe it off!
zh: 尿在马桶圈上记得擦掉！

en: What Alice, waiting for a reply, was faced with was a sudden howl. It was a resounding noise, sharp as to burst her ear drums, loud as to reach unto the heavens.
zh: 等待回复的爱丽丝突然听到一声嚎叫，那声音震耳欲聋，响彻云霄，感觉耳膜都要被震裂了。

en: When attaching a polarizing plate, set it first and then attach a protective plate (a clear acrylic plate).
zh: 安装偏光板时，先把它放好，然后再装上保护板（透明亚克力板）。

en: It's not as if an emissary from outer space will have slipped into school uniform and be loitering around seeking a partner.
zh: 哪有什么外星使者换上校服在学校里晃悠找搭档啊。

en: He plastered the wall with posters.
zh: 他在墙上贴满了海报。

en: In regard to the internship system in the United States I availed myself of part of Miyumi Tanaka's work "Making doctors in Harvard" (Igaku-Shoin Ltd.) as a reference.
zh: 关于美国的实习制度，我参考了田中美由美所著《哈佛医生养成记》（医学书院出版）中的部分内容。

en: In America 'rebate' is widely recognized, generally as an incentive where makers give back directly to consumers.
zh: 在美国，“返利”很普遍，通常是生产商直接给消费者返现的一种促销手段。

en: Once the complaining starts, it never ends.
zh: 只要一抱怨起来就没完没了。

en: When writing a sentence, generally you start with a capital letter and finish with a period (.), an exclamation mark (!), or a question mark (?).
zh: 写句子时，通常开头首字母要大写，句末用句号、感叹号或者问号。

en: I know. I've thought about how to pace myself.
zh: 我知道，我已经想好怎么调整自己的节奏了。

en: I'm a thief, I'll go back when I've taken the stuff. Report me and I'll stab you.
zh: 我是个贼，东西拿完就走。你要是敢报警我就捅了你。

en: A little bird told me.
zh: 我是听小道消息说的。

en: That was probably just before Mai took the drastic step of leaving home.
zh: 那大概就在小舞做出离家出走这种惊人举动前不久。

en: Usually the id and name attributes have the same value applied. (N.B. Not because it matters if they differ but just as a matter of convenience.)
zh: 一般来说，id 和 name 属性值都是一样的。（注：倒不是说不一样不行，纯粹是为了方便。）

en: A typical nurse will do such things as helping with a urinal bottle, and shaving in preparation for surgery!
zh: 普通护士得干不少杂活，像帮病人接尿、术前备皮刮毛什么的！

zh: 谁捡到归谁。

en: The mean value of the frequency decreases with increasing amplitude.
zh: 频率的平均值会随着振幅的增大而减小。

en: The prime minister directly confronted the challenges of his political opponents.
zh: 首相正面回应了政敌的挑战。

en: It's all right to drink, but drink in moderation.
zh: 喝酒可以，但得适量，别贪杯。

en: The glass fronted building before you is the rose garden. It's a greenhouse so you will always be able to appreciate the roses.
zh: 眼前这座玻璃房子就是玫瑰园。这是个温室，所以你随时都能来赏花。

en: She smiled to smooth things over.
zh: 她笑了笑，想把这事儿圆过去。

en: Please don't be cold!
zh: 别对我这么冷淡嘛！

en: The car was stuck in the mud.
zh: 车陷进泥里了。

en: We reached our destination just as I thought the car was going to give up the ghost.
zh: 就在我觉得这车快要罢工的时候，我们总算赶到目的地了。

en: Car? Ah, if you mean that limousine, - I chartered it.
zh: 车？啊，你要是说那辆加长豪华轿车，那是我包下的。

en: I've apologised, so lay off, OK?
zh: 我都道歉了，你就别揪着不放了吧？

en: I've apologized, so lay off, OK?
zh: 我都已经道过歉了，你就放过我吧，行吗？

en: I've apologized, so get off my back.
zh: 我都道完歉了，你就别再找我麻烦了。

en: The president is a down-to-earth kind of man.
zh: 老板这人挺接地气的。

en: The company president's welcome was so long that we were squeezed for time in the second half of the ceremony.
zh: 社长的欢迎辞太长了，搞得我们下半场仪式时间特别赶。

en: Distrust of the Social Insurance Agency and the Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare just keeps getting stronger.
zh: 大家对社保厅和厚劳省的信任度越来越低了。

en: Actually if you eat beets your urine may turn a light pink colour.
zh: 其实吃了甜菜之后，尿液可能会变成淡粉色。

en: Actually this will be my fourth question.
zh: 实际上，这已经是我的第四个问题了。

en: Actually that I bring a huge volume of reference material with me is a makeshift way of preventing people from disputing my case.
zh: 其实我带这么多参考资料，只是为了不让人家反驳我的临时说辞。

en: Please write in a way that concretely conveys the question.
zh: 请写清楚，把问题描述得具体点。

en: Although the unemployment problem can't be ignored, the environment problem is also very important.
zh: 虽然失业问题不能忽视，但环境问题也同样重要。

en: Tanabata comes up in manga a lot so I also know it fairly well.
zh: 漫画里经常出现七夕，所以我对这个也挺了解的。

en: You can put into practice the plan you thought up.
zh: 你可以把你构思的计划付诸实践。

en: It's hard to live with the knowledge that you are a failure.
zh: 带着“我是个失败者”这种意识生活真的很难熬。

en: Even I was defeated.
zh: 连我都输了。

en: Even I can't believe that.
zh: 连我都不敢相信。

en: Even I can't endure it.
zh: 连我都受不了了。

en: You should know it.
zh: 你应该知道吧。

en: I'll do it by myself too.
zh: 我也打算自己一个人搞定。

en: Do it by yourself.
zh: 你自己弄吧。

en: I know it myself.
zh: 我自己心里有数。

en: When I put 100 yen in and pressed the button to buy a coffee at the vending machine, four cans dropped down all at once!
zh: 我往自动贩卖机里投了100日元想买咖啡，结果按完钮一下掉出来四罐！

en: The bike screeched to a stop.
zh: 自行车嘎吱一声停了下来。

en: When my home had an extension built I only had this room fitted with soundproofing and an internal lock.
zh: 家里扩建的时候，我就只在这个房间装了隔音和内锁。

en: Checking the clock it was exactly 21:00.
zh: 看了眼表，正好是九点整。

en: There's no time, so ready-made pack OK?
zh: 没时间了，用现成的料理包行吗？

en: Transcending time, the insects of ages gone past dance livelily in amber.
zh: 跨越时空，琥珀里那些远古昆虫仿佛还在欢快地起舞。

en: Rather than coming to resemble each other, it feels like they are birds of a feather.
zh: 与其说他们变得越来越像，倒不如说他们本来就是一类人。

en: The actions of Coen, directly commanding the cruise at the time of the accident, are of utmost significance.
zh: 事故发生时直接指挥游轮的科恩，他的行为至关重要。

en: A fact-finding committee was set up to determine the cause of the incident.
zh: 为了查明事故原因，专门成立了一个调查委员会。

en: It's ludicrous to continue business operations while selling off bit by bit the land on which your business depends.
zh: 一边把赖以生存的土地一点点卖掉，一边还继续经营，这简直太荒唐了。

en: He grits his teeth and forces back his growing fear.
zh: 他咬紧牙关，强压住心头的恐惧。

en: Before the match, an opening ceremony was held in the Yoyogi stadium.
zh: 比赛开始前，代代木体育馆举行了开幕式。

en: The publication of the exam results over without incident, for the time being attention is naturally going to focus on the summer break, right?
zh: 成绩总算顺利公布了，接下来的焦点自然就是暑假了吧？

en: In order to return to our era, what should we do?
zh: 为了回到我们的时代，我们该怎么办？

en: I had an intravenous drip in hospital.
zh: 我在医院挂了点滴。

en: I got an IV at the hospital.
zh: 我在医院打了吊瓶。

en: I like the simplicity of her dress.
zh: 我喜欢她裙子那种简约的设计。

en: I knew I'd broken my wrist the moment I fell.
zh: 摔倒的那一刻，我就知道手腕断了。

en: I met him last week for the first time in ages.
zh: 上周我见到了他，好久没见了。

en: I dropped out of school when I was in the 7th grade.
zh: 我上初一的时候退学了。

en: I'm not well enough to take care of others.
zh: 我自己都顾不过来，哪有精力照顾别人。

en: I was kicked out of high school.
zh: 我高中被开除了。

en: I'm not a Muslim and so I have no obligation to observe the fast but as long as I'm living in the same apartment having consideration for such a custom is important.
zh: 我不是穆斯林，没义务守斋，但既然住在一起，尊重这种习俗还是很重要的。

en: I waited until the last minute.
zh: 我一直拖到了最后一刻。

en: My husband has two older brothers. (That's right, I'm a third-son's wife)
zh: 我老公有两个哥哥。（没错，我是家里的三儿媳妇。）

en: My kids have their spring break soon.
zh: 孩子们快放春假了。

en: From what I've seen of the product so far, it's pretty good.
zh: 就目前看来，这产品还挺不错的。

en: I have included the names and prices of a couple of hotels which are reasonably close to where I live.
zh: 我列了几家离我住处挺近的酒店名字和价格。

en: It appears that I don't have it in me to have a harem in my charge.
zh: 看来我真没那本事去管什么后宫。

en: We left the motorway at junction 11.
zh: 我们从11号出口下了高速。

en: I've never stayed out this late walking before.
zh: 我以前从来没在外面散步到这么晚。

en: Select the graft point after imagining how the branches will extend and fruit grow.
zh: 先想象一下树枝会怎么长、果实会怎么结，再选嫁接点。

en: There are too many demonstrative pronouns. To put it bluntly, it couldn't be harder to understand.
zh: 代词太多了，直白点说，简直太难懂了。

en: It wasn't as expensive as I expected.
zh: 没我想象的那么贵。

en: That's me - the coward unable to screw up his courage and find out the truth.
zh: 这就是我，一个没勇气去查明真相的胆小鬼。

en: That's me - the coward unable to muster his courage and find out the truth.
zh: 这就是我，一个鼓不起勇气去查明真相的懦夫。

en: In spoiling her child, Stella made a rod for her own back in the years that were to follow.
zh: 斯特拉太娇惯孩子了，结果后来苦了自己。

en: The children chased after the circus parade.
zh: 孩子们追着马戏团的巡游队伍跑。

en: Children should obey their parents.
zh: 孩子应该听父母的话。

en: My sister is quick-thinking.
zh: 我姐脑子转得很快。

en: By using four types of metal, specific frequency resonance is suppressed.
zh: 通过使用四种金属，特定频率的共振被抑制了。

en: If it continues to be stimulated the skin's protective function causes thickening and it becomes stiff and hard with pores that stand out.
zh: 如果持续受刺激，皮肤的保护机制会让它变厚变硬，毛孔也会变得很明显。

en: In the case of not agreeing to the conditions of the usage consent contract, promptly return the unopened media package to ABC for a full refund.
zh: 如不同意使用协议的条款，请立即将未拆封的软件包退回ABC以获全额退款。

en: How about using disposable droppers?
zh: 用一次性滴管怎么样？

en: Stop putting off finding a job.
zh: 别再拖着不去找工作了。

en: He got the sack for slacking off at work.
zh: 他因为工作偷懒被开除了。

en: He got fired for slacking off at work.
zh: 他因为上班摸鱼被炒了鱿鱼。

en: Say that work is 8 hours, it feels like the three hour commute time is also work but you don't get any money for it. What a waste.
zh: 就算工作八小时，感觉三小时的通勤也跟上班似的还没钱拿，太亏了。

en: Acid soil is neutralised by ash.
zh: 草木灰可以中和酸性土壤。

en: The reduction in obstetricians and gynecologists is a reflection of the decrease in births, thus reducing need for medical care.
zh: 产科医生减少反映了出生率的下降，医疗需求也跟着降了。

en: With a shortage of midwives added to that of obstetricians it has become clear all over again that our country's obstetric care is in an extremely grave situation.
zh: 产科医生和助产士都缺，这再次说明咱们国家的产科医疗形势非常严峻。

en: After the bushfires, we have independently decided to call off this year's fireworks display.
zh: 森林火灾之后，我们自主决定取消了今年的烟花表演。

en: The sun had barely risen at the foot of the mountain when she set out alone up the slope.
zh: 太阳刚在山脚升起，她就独自一人出发上山了。

en: Mimura Yasuyuki (Konichika LTD, Managing Director) died of heart attack on the third, age 45.
zh: Konichika有限公司的常务董事三村泰幸于3号因心脏病去世，享年45岁。

en: Rust is gradually eating into the metal parts.
zh: 铁锈正在一点点侵蚀金属部件。

en: The pigs are coming! Let's beat it!
zh: 條子來了！快溜！

en: Here come the police. Let's get out of here.
zh: 警察來了，趕緊離開這兒。

en: To start with the film crew travelled around the country looking for locations.
zh: 最開始，劇組在全國各地跑，尋找取景地。

en: I feel smart today, to a degree that is in proportion to the amount of good rest I had yesterday.
zh: 我今天感覺腦子特別靈光，跟我昨天休息得好壞成正比。

en: What that fortuneteller said yesterday is nothing to be concerned about.
zh: 那個算命的昨天說的話，別放在心上。

en: Her old bike squeaked as she rode down the hill.
zh: 她騎著那輛舊自行車下坡時，車子咯吱咯吱地響。

en: In the financial world opposition is apparently increasing against the withdrawal of the proposed bill.
zh: 金融界顯然越來越反對撤回那項提議法案。

en: His criminal record is apparently for murder, but he won't start to talk about the details.
zh: 聽說他有謀殺前科，但他對細節隻字不提。

en: Delivery of the materials took two whole months so it will be late for the 12th of December.
zh: 材料運了整整兩個月，所以趕不上12月12號了。

en: My wife loves fish hors d'oeuvre, so it's easier for me to get a kitchen pass for my fishing.
zh: 我老婆特別喜歡吃魚肉冷盤，所以我申請出去釣魚還挺容易獲准的。

en: My wife gave birth prematurely to a 1500-gram baby girl.
zh: 我老婆早產，生了個1500克的女孩。

en: At most 10 people can sit round the table.
zh: 這張桌子最多能坐10個人。

en: In the latest report, it is written that 90% of all the cocaine smuggled in the world is transported by sea, and most of that by speedboat.
zh: 最新報告顯示，全球90%的走私可卡因是走海運，而且大部分是用快艇運的。

en: As expectation increases that the dollar will weaken, the foreign exchange market's reaction to US economic indicators has been fairly muted.
zh: 隨著美元走軟的預期增強，外匯市場對美國經濟指標的反應相當平淡。

en: What a mess...I suppose there's nothing for it but restricting admissions. Handing out numbered tickets or something.
zh: 太亂了……看來只能限流了，發號碼牌之類的吧。

en: The race developed into a free-for-all but Shinomiya lapped the group and in the final stage steadily piled on points with good timing to achieve victory.
zh: 比賽演變成了大混戰，但四宮反超了一圈，並在最後階段把握時機穩紮穩打，最終奪冠。

en: Even though we're engaged, she wouldn't let me kiss her.
zh: 雖然我們訂婚了，但她還是不讓我親她。

en: On the whole, the pomato plants are growing well this year.
zh: 總的來說，今年的番茄土豆長勢不錯。

en: Write up the daily report today!
zh: 把今天的日報給寫了！

en: Today's a school day. I'd better make sure not to be late ...
zh: 今天要上學，我可千萬不能遲到……

en: I'm not using my home heater today.
zh: 我今天家裡沒開暖氣。

en: We have a kanji dictation test today.
zh: 我們今天有漢字聽寫測驗。

en: Let's make Valentine's Day chocolate today.
zh: 我們今天來做情人節巧克力吧。

en: He used so much inflated language in his speech today I couldn't figure out what he was saying.
zh: 他今天的演講用了太多華而不實的辭藻，我都沒聽懂他在說什麼。

en: Today's class continues with inequalities. Like yesterday try to display the domains in x and y.
zh: 今天的課繼續講不等式。像昨天一樣，試著表示出x和y的定義域。

en: Today's agenda concerns the re-election of the student council. If anybody wishes to stand as a candidate, please raise your hand.
zh: 今天的議程是學生會改選。如果有人想競選，請舉手。

en: With this, today's activities come to a close.
zh: 今天的活動到此結束。

en: Today's topic is "the problem of Japanese people abducted by North Korea".
zh: 今天的課題是“日本人被朝鮮綁架的問題”。

en: That guy today, he's being too eccentric - I can't keep up with him.
zh: 那傢伙今天太古怪了，我都跟不上他的思路。

en: Today, looking at this web page, I realized that if these people are idiots then I must be a complete moron.
zh: 今天看了這個網頁我才發現，如果這些人是白痴，那我簡直就是個大笨蛋。

en: This time, so I don't run out of things to talk about, I'll write a list on the palm of my hand.
zh: 為了這次不冷場，我要在手心裡寫個清單。

en: My hair's messed up this morning. At least lend me a hand mirror - it should be shut in the drawer there.
zh: 我今早頭髮亂糟糟的。起碼借我個小鏡子用一下，應該就在抽屜裡放著呢。

en: This wasn't here this morning ... looks like somebody's been fly tipping.
zh: 早上這兒還沒有這東西……看來有人在這兒亂倒垃圾。

en: For some reason it looks to be turning out to be a depressing week.
zh: 不知道為什麼，這週似乎注定會很壓抑。

en: Was your mock exam score this time within the pass range for your preferred school?
zh: 你這次模考的分數達到你想考的學校的錄取線了嗎？

en: This time I stayed for the first time in a private villa, and it was really quite something.
zh: 這次我第一次住私人別墅，感覺真的很棒。

en: I came to know the man who is now my husband through e-mail; from an acquaintanceship started in that odd way, before a month had passed, we found ourselves resolving to get married.
zh: 我跟我老公是通過郵件認識的；就這麼奇妙地結緣後，不到一個月我們就決定結婚了。

en: Fred's agitation has now subsided, and he's sleeping peacefully.
zh: 弗雷德現在平靜下來了，正睡得很香。

en: It's OK, that doesn't count.
zh: 沒事，那個不算。

en: Right now my score in Cooking is about 45 out of 100. Great isn't it? That's not a fail!
zh: 現在我的廚藝評分大概是100分裡的45分。厲害吧？這還不算不及格呢！

en: So it's finally time to pay the piper.
zh: 終於到了該付出代價的時候了。

en: A black limo rounded the corner with a squeal of tires.
zh: 一輛黑色豪華轎車伴隨著刺耳的剎車聲轉過了拐角。

en: At Kuroda Primary School we assemble at a prearranged time and go to school as a group.
zh: 在黑田小學，我們在約定好的時間集合，然後結伴上學。

en: It is foreseen that, due to the decline in grain production, China will quickly become a world leading grain importing country, overtaking Japan.
zh: 預計由於糧食減產，中國將迅速超過日本，成為世界主要的糧食進口國。

en: The Department of Homeland Security's primary function is the prevention of terrorist attacks occurring within America and, in the extreme case of an attack happening, holding losses to the smallest possible level and swiftly carrying out restoration.
zh: 美國國土安全部的主要職責是預防國內恐怖襲擊，並在發生襲擊的極端情況下，將損失降到最低並迅速進行恢復。

en: There are three cases where people are not able to do English questions; the first is not being able to read fast.
zh: 英語題做不出來有三種情況，第一種就是閱讀速度不夠快。

en: Parliamentary activity has become a political tug of war between the ruling and opposition parties over the issue.
zh: 議會活動已演變成執政黨和在野黨圍繞該問題的政治拉鋸戰。

en: Whether it's national economics, family economics, or personal economics, it's not something where sloppy accounting is good enough.
zh: 無論是國家經濟、家庭經濟還是個人經濟，都不能糊里糊塗地記賬。

en: Because this is such a highly technical subject, I would like to point out in advance the likelihood that some of what I'm about to say may include information that is incorrect.
zh: 由於這是一個專業性很強的主題，我想先說明一下，接下來我說的內容可能包含一些不準確的信息。

en: The Takamatuzuka burial mound is located in Nara prefecture, Asukamura.
zh: 高松塚古墳位於奈良縣明日香村。
